thread.title: WB
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by WB

author: WB
title: WB
text:
I got five frames, three metal poster style frames and two wooden frames. It looks professionally done, except for the frame where I didn't get a big enough margin for the mat board, and that was really on me.
All of my struggles (literally all of them) with assembly were a direct result of me not reading the directions. So just, don't be like me. Read the directions and it'll be really simple. And seriously, they look great.
